name: 36 Hours
description:
An endless shooter with motivating music that you will enjoy playing when you have no internet :D.

Controls:
WASD - movement
Left Shift- Stomp/increase gravity (2.5s cooldown)
F - Dash in the direcetion you're looking/ deacrease gravity (5s cooldown)
Spacebar - jump
Right click - Aim
Left Click - shoot

The game was made on a gamejam, so it has most likely no optimization.

We'll improve the game from time to time and we'll keep you updated in case you're interested in the game.
Be sure to drop your highscore in the comments if you enjoyed the game, any constructive criticism is accepted of course :)

Love,
The Dead Smiley Crew

P.S. we bet you won't pass 400 kills ;)
